CustomField.description:
E2B (R2): B.1.7.1b, patientmedicalstartdateformat (3N) --> Value should be 102 AND B.1.7.1c, patientmedicalstartdate (8N) --> convert to CCYYMMDD E2B (R2): B.1.10.7.1b, parentmedicalstartdateformat (3N) --> Value should be 102 AND B.1.10.7.1c, parentmedicalstartdate (8N) --> convert to CCYYMMDD
E2B (R3): D.7.1.r.2 Start Date E2B (R3): D.10.7.1.r.2 Start Date Conformance: Optional Data Type: Date / Time OID: None Value Allowed: See Appendix II for further information nullFlavor: MSK, ASKU, NASK
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If precise dates are unknown and a text description aids in understanding the medical history, or if concise additional information is helpful in showing the relevance of the past medical history, this information can be included in the comments.
CustomField.label: Start Date
